body.name: Battery Operated Fan, Camping Fan Battery Powered, Super Long Lasting, Portable D-Cell Battery Powered Desk Fan with Timer, 3 Speeds, Quiet, 180° Rotation, for Office,Bedroom,Outdoor, 5'', Blue
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 41 mins
features: 【Battey Operated Fan for Camping】This 5 inch battery fan works with 4 D-cell batteries (not included), which is ideal for camping, travel, power outages and emergency needs. There are 3 settings and the fan can last for 214 hours with low speed, 46 hours with medium speed, and 12 hours with high speed!

【Quiet Desk Fan with Timer】This small but powerful desk fan is very quiet owing to our newly designed motor which lowers the noise to 50dB. It's perfect for sleeping and working when you need a silent environment. This portable fan has a unique timer feature which can be set to 1, 3 or 5 hours. No need to wake up to turn off this quiet fan.

【Rotation and Portability】The 180° rotation design lets you take the fresh air directly to your face and get cool instantly. With the comvenient handle, it is easy to carry around. Great for travel, camping and other outdoor activities use.

【Battery Powered USB Fan】Except powered by D batteries, this fan can be a USB desk fan. It comes with a USB cable that can be used when connected to a power bank, car charger, computer, or a 5V wall USB charger. Note: it is also compatible with carbon D battery, alkaline D battery or rechargeable NiMH battery.
Note: The required power of the first gear is 68mA, the second gear is 280mA, and the third gear is 700mA. To drive the fan to work on the highest level, the current should reach 700mA.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Super Long Lasting Battery Operated Fan for Camping D-Cell Battery Powered Desk Fan with Timer Strong WindLong Lasting up to 214 hoursQuiet Operation3 Speed SettingTimer Feature180 ° Rotation

Super Long Lasting Portable Fan This small but powerful desk fan has 3 speed settings and you can choose the airflow at your preference. The wind is very large owing to our newly designed motor. If you put 4 D-cell batteries in it, it can last for 12 hours at high speed, 46 hours at medium speed, and 214 hours at low speed!! A must fan for emergency! Note: The required power of the first gear is 68mA, the second gear is 280mA, and the third gear is 700mA. To drive the fan to work on the highest level, the current should reach 700mA.

Portable Battery Powered Fan with Handle 180° Rotation The 180° rotation design lets you take the fresh air directly to your face and get cool instantly. With the built-in handle, it is easy to carry it around. Great for travel, camping and other outdoor activities use. Whisper Quiet Desk Fan with Timer If you are a light sleeper, this fan will be perfect for you. The noise level is only 50 db. Perfect for use at home, office, and outside.The timer feature allows you to turn off the fan after some time. The timer can be 1, 3 or 5 hours. No need to wake up to turn off this quiet fan. USB Powered Desk Fan This 5 inch desk fan works with 4 D-cell batteries (not included) or it can be powered by USB cable, which is ideal for camping, travel, power outages and emergency needs. Note: it is also compatible with carbon D battery, alkaline D battery or rechargeable NiMH battery.
A Cool Small Fan that You Can Take Anywhere! Easy to Carry Desk Fan Outdoor Fan

Kind Reminders: 1. While using batteries, please ensure you are using brand new and powerful 4 D-cell batteries (compatible with carbon D battery, alkaline D battery, or rechargeable NiMH battery). Weak batteries are not able to drive the fan properly. 2. While using the USB cable, please ensure the connecting USB port supplies 5V/1-2A rated power or it will not have enough power to run at high speed. 3. Different brands of D-cell batteries might have 0.5mm lengths of difference in the protrusion of the positive electrode. If you feel that the battery is loose after installation, you can adjust the spring plate in the battery compartment, and pull the ring out a little bit so it can be well fixed. Troubleshooting: Q: How does this fan work? A: This fan can be powered by 4 D-cell batteries (not included) or USB power source, like computer, power bank and phone charger with the USB cable(included). (Note: This fan is not rechargeable) ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Q: Why doesn't the fan work? A: Please check whether the batteries are installed correctly or the USB cable is connected to device properly. If it still doesn’t work, please let us know through Amazon for help. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Q: How long will the battery last? A: This fan works with 4 D-cell batteries (not included), and there are 3 settings and the fan can last for 214 hours with low speed, 46 hours with medium speed, and 12 hours with high speed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Noisy, efficient, handy
reviews.reviewText: This fan is light, but it feels sturdy enough for the outdoor camping stuff.It blows air nicely but at its max setting, it is.... loud. It's understandable since the fan is smaller than most rechargeable fans, but it is also a minor gripe.The ability to use removable batteries or USB is a plus.I hope this one lasts a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Powerful for a battery fan
reviews.reviewText: This little thing works great for a battery fan, and the batteries last good. I use it in the car to keep my dog cool when traveling, since the air conditioner doesn't do so well in the back seat. I adjust it where he can either let it blow on him, or not, as he chooses. It has different speeds which is perfect, depending on how much cooling is needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We had a tornado go through our town last week. Damaged three counties! Power lines ripped and torn down! So they warned us we would be without electricity for at least three days.I jumped on Amazon and ordered this battery operated fan because it is HOT and I can't sleep without a fan. Who else needs a fan to sleep? I do!The first night without a fan was miserable. Luckily this arrived the next day and was amazing from the start! It does have great air flow, I used the lowest setting all night and what a relief! Used it for three nights and still going strong!This is now in my emergency kit for power outages.And like someone else pointed out...order the batteries at the same time! LOL! Thanks for that tip whoever you are!This fan is easy to carry and doesn't take up much space.Quiet for a battery operated fan!Pushes out lots of air!This will also be my new traveling fan for hotel stays. I love that you can use batteries or usb. I have several usb power banks and you should too!Get it! You won't regret it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Camping fan that works well
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. So i have to say that I wasn't expecting much from this fan. The price was fair and i had seen mixed reviews. Figured I would give it a shot since Amazon has a good return policy.Pros:It has a convenient handle to carry fan.The fan pivots up and down far. Giving you lots of options to set it up for optimal air flow.Has 3 adjustable fan speed settings.Has 3 shut-off timer settings if you need.The max fan speed puts out a great deal of air considering the size of the unit itself.Included is a usb plug to run it off of power sources. Also as D battery size compartment to make it portable.Cons: the battery life is fair but could be better. We had it runing on hi for 7hours until it shut off by itself. I'm assuming it may have gotten hot.No hanging hook to use in tent. But you can always use string or something.The model i got was yellow, and i hate yellow.No light other than the buttons that could be used while camping or reading a book.Overall I'm very satisfied with the fan. Small fan with big air. Definitely going to buy more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect for small personal use.
reviews.reviewText: My bathroom gets very stuffy even with the window open. This fan is the perfect size for my small bathroom to keep the air circulating especially after a shower. An an mature female my temperature regulators don't work as well as they use to, so while I'm brushing my teeth or other hygiene procedures, I can have the fan directed to me. It is very quiet and has several speeds, all of which I use. This fan works exactly as I expected. Since I just started using it, I don't know how it will hold up in the long term. Time will tell

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This product hits all the marks
reviews.reviewText: We originally ordered some cheaper fans that came in used horrifying condition. I felted kind of ripped off that I had to purchase more expensive fans but they were worth the price. My children, 16 and 11 both took one to scout camp during a very humid and hot week last week. They both loved the low white noise from the fan and appreciated its cooling power at night. One of my sons had it on full blast most of the time and didn't need replacement batteries until night 5 of the camping trip and the other kept his on medium and used a timer most of the time just to get through until he was in his REM sleep and his batteries lasted the entire 7 nights and still has power remaining. These are not cheaply made fans and I am expecting a decent life out of them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use this every night by my bed and love it. I have also used it when the power went out once and it did a great job. I like the fact that I can plug it in at night and when needed it runs on the batteries. I don't know how long the batteries last since I only ran it a short time during a power outage .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This fan is strong for its size and provides cool air yes BUT after awhile? like a month or so, the mode number 3 which is the high speed will stop working! no matter if the batteries are truly new and full. I have several of them and use them to keep my old dog cool in bed but you can use the speed 1 or 2 at best as the high speed button and functionality will stop working in about a month or two. It has happened to the other ones I have too.
Es pequeño y esperaba que no fuera potente sin embargo, me sorprendió y el precio es bajo, requiere 4 pilas D, hasta el momento no ha presentado fallas.

Bought it as a gift, to use in a restaurant kitchen to cool off the cook, without cooling the food off. Works wonderful, love the ability to tilt to make it point directly at a person. Also love how it runs on batteries, so no plug in needed.Highly recommend buying rechargeable batteries. This fan runs as long as it is as advertised to.Wonderful product!

reviews.reviewTitle: good fan for the price Battery life is less than i expected but it works well
reviews.reviewText: Battery life is less than i expected but it works well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect for the caravan, dogs love it.

reviews.reviewText: Couldn’t be better. Surprising how effective it is for the small size.
